attributes.action: Make LEAVE campaigners explain their lies to parliament.
attributes.additional_details:
Since last Thursday's referendum, Honourable Members have been queuing up to tell us, the electorate, that those promises cannot now be implemented.
In my view the referendum was won on a lie and those responsible should now face our elected representative's and explain why.
attributes.background: Leave campaigners claimed that £350million extra would be made available as funds for the NHS and education. They also claimed that immigration would fall if the public voted to leave, besides making other promises about things like freeing up our fishing industry.
